scripts.update-types: pnpm --filter @wedding-plan/types build && pnpm --filter @wedding-plan/types pack --pack-destination ../functions && pnpm --filter functions install ./wedding-plan-types-1.0.0.tgz
scripts.deploy:dev: pnpm --filter @wedding-plan/types build && pnpm build:dev && firebase use wedding-c89a1 && firebase deploy --only hosting:development
scripts.deploy:prod: pnpm --filter @wedding-plan/types build && pnpm build:prod && firebase use wedding-prod-f13a0 && firebase deploy --only hosting:production -P production
scripts.deploy:functions:prod: pnpm --filter @wedding-plan/types build && pnpm --filter @wedding-plan/types pack --pack-destination ../functions && pnpm --filter functions install ./wedding-plan-types-1.0.0.tgz && pnpm --filter functions build && firebase use wedding-prod-f13a0 && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:prod:both: pnpm --filter @wedding-plan/types build && pnpm --filter @wedding-plan/types pack --pack-destination ../functions && pnpm --filter functions install ./wedding-plan-types-1.0.0.tgz && pnpm build:prod && pnpm --filter functions build && firebase deploy --only hosting:production,functions -P production
scripts.deploy:dev:both: pnpm --filter @wedding-plan/types build && pnpm --filter @wedding-plan/types pack --pack-destination ../functions && pnpm --filter functions install ./wedding-plan-types-1.0.0.tgz && pnpm build:dev && pnpm --filter functions build && firebase use wedding-c89a1 && firebase deploy --only hosting:development,functions -P development
